datoCmsKey.name: Mary Mondlock

headshot.title: Mary Mondlock, headshot via Editor, 4:15:47 AM 12/25/2020

datoCmsKey.danceExperience: Intermediate jazz, modern, ballet and tap.
datoCmsKey.bio: Hey! I’m Mary, an NYC based actor/singer. I graduated from Baldwin Wallace in Music Theater and have lived in Manhattan ever since. I have performed all over the world working on cruise ships and regionally/in NYC. When I’m not performing I love spending time and traveling with my beautiful girlfriend, Nat, reading, listening to podcasts and getting my body moving!
